mapper.insert: insert into truck (id, supplier_id, type, number, driving_permit, status, remark, create_time, create_user, last_update_time, last_update_use) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drivingPermit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update truck set supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driving_permit = #{drivingPermit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_use = #{lastUpdateUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, supplier_id, type, number, driving_permit, status, remark, create_time, create_user, last_update_time, last_update_use from truck where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
